name: harper-edge-ai-example
description: Minimal example demonstrating TensorFlow.js integration with Harper

scripts.preinstall:
echo '
📦 Installing dependencies (this may take 1-2 minutes)...
'
scripts.postinstall:
echo '
✅ Installation complete!

📝 Next steps:
   npm test          - Test the model
   npm run dev       - Run with Harper
'
scripts.verify: node -e "console.log('Node version:', process.version); console.log('✅ Environment OK')"

author: HarperDB
